pages.text: $(li)The Ender Guardian is a giant creature with high defense that lies in the deep of the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_citadel)Ruined Citadel$(/l).$(br)$(li)It will attack you physically with its strength, or summoning void runes underground and attracting you to it.$(br)$(li)Once it reaches 50% health, its defense is halved.

pages.name: Ender Guardian
pages.text: It drops the $(l:patchouli:weapons/gauntlet_of_guard)Gauntlet of Guard$(/l) and rarely a Music Disc upon death.
